TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceInstaller extends System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller

summary.span: 安装一个类，该类扩展 来实现服务。

span.span: Installs a class that extends to implement a service.

summary.span: 在安装服务应用程序时由安装实用工具调用该类。

span.span: This class is called by the install utility when installing a service application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 运作的特定于其关联的服务。The does work specific to the service with which it is associated. 安装实用程序使用它来编写到子项 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\System\CurrentControlSet\Services 注册表项中的服务与相关联的注册表值。It is used by the installation utility to write registry values associated with the service to a subkey within the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\System\CurrentControlSet\Services registry key. 该服务由其 ServiceName 中此子项标识。The service is identified by its ServiceName within this subkey. 子项还包括服务所属的.dll 的可执行文件的名称。The subkey also includes the name of the executable or .dll to which the service belongs. 若要安装的服务，创建的项目安装程序类继承自类，并设置到类中的属性`true`。To install a service, create a project installer class that inherits from the class, and set the attribute on the class to `true`. 您的项目内创建一个每个服务应用程序，另一个实例应用程序中每个服务实例。Within your project, create one instance per service application, and one instance for each service in the application. 在项目安装程序类构造函数，将设置为服务使用的安装属性并实例，并将实例添加到集合。Within your project installer class constructor, set the installation properties for the service using the and instances, and add the instances to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 建议用于添加安装程序实例; 使用构造函数但是，如果您需要将添加到中的集合方法，请务必执行上述相同的元素添加到集合中方法。It is recommended that you use the constructor for adding installer instances; however, if you need to add to the collection in the method, be sure to perform the same additions to the collection in the method. 所有类派生自类的状态集合必须在相同和方法。For all classes deriving from the class, the state of the collection must be the same in the and methods. 但是，您可以避免跨集合的维护并方法，如果您安装程序将实例添加到自定义安装程序类构造函数中的集合。调用安装实用工具时，它会寻找属性。However, you can avoid the maintenance of the collection across the and methods if you add installer instances to the collection in your custom installer class constructor.When the install utility is called, it looks for the attribute. 如果属性是`true`，安装已添加到的所有服务，该实用工具与其关联的项目安装程序的集合。If the attribute is `true`, the utility installs all the services that were added to the collection that were associated with your project installer. 如果是`false`或不存在，安装实用工具会忽略项目安装程序。If is `false` or does not exist, the install utility ignores the project installer. 与项目安装类安装信息普遍适用于所有关联中项目的实例。The associated with your project installation class installs information common to all instances in the project. 如果此服务具有开来安装项目中的其他服务的任何内容，此方法被安装该服务特定的信息。If this service has anything that separates it from the other services in the installation project, that service-specific information is installed by this method. > [!NOTE] > 是至关重要的致类派生自的。It is crucial that the be identical to the of the class you derived from . 通常情况下，值服务应用程序的可执行文件的 main （） 函数中设置服务的属性。Normally, the value of the property for the service is set within the Main() function of the service application's executable. 服务控制管理器使用属性来查找此可执行文件中的服务。The Service Control Manager uses the property to locate the service within this executable. 您可以修改其他属性上之前或之后将其添加到项目安装程序的集合。You can modify other properties on the either before or after adding it to the collection of your project installer. 例如，服务的可能设置为启动时自动重新启动服务或要求用户手动启动该服务。For example, a service's may be set to start the service automatically at reboot or require a user to start the service manually. 通常情况下，您将不会调用方法上在代码中; 它们通常称为仅由安装实用工具。Normally, you will not call the methods on within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility. 安装实用工具会自动调用和在安装过程中的方法。The install utility automatically calls the and methods during the installation process. 如有必要，它退出故障，通过调用(或) 上所有以前安装的组件。It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling (or ) on all previously installed components. 安装实用工具调用删除的对象。The installation utility calls to remove the object. 应用程序的安装例程会维护有关已安装，使用项目安装程序的组件自动信息。An application's install routine maintains information automatically about the components already installed, using the project installer's . 此状态信息将持续更新作为实例，并且每个实用工具安装实例。This state information is continuously updated as the instance, and each instance is installed by the utility. 它是通常不需要为你的代码可以显式修改状态信息。It is usually unnecessary for your code to modify state information explicitly. 执行安装时，它会自动创建安装与关联的事件日志源派生的类。When the installation is performed, it automatically creates an to install the event log source associated with the derived class. 设置为此源属性到计算机的应用程序日志的构造函数。The property for this source is set by the constructor to the computer's Application log. 当您将设置的(这应该是相同服务的)，则自动设置为相同的值。When you set the of the (which should be identical to the of the service), the is automatically set to the same value. 在安装失败时，源的安装以及以前安装的服务是回滚。In an installation failure, the source's installation is rolled-back along with previously installed services. 方法尝试在运行时将其停止的服务。The method tries to stop the service if it is running. 无论成功与否，撤消所做的更改。Whether this succeeds or not, undoes the changes made by . 如果事件日志记录创建新的源，将删除源。If a new source was created for event logging, the source is deleted. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个项目安装程序，称为`MyProjectInstaller`，后者又继承。The following example creates a project installer, called `MyProjectInstaller`, which inherits from . 假定没有服务可执行文件，其中包含两个服务，"Hello World 服务 1"和"Hello World 服务 2"。It is assumed there is a service executable that contains two services, "Hello-World Service 1" and "Hello-World Service 2". 中的构造函数`MyProjectInstaller`（这将调用由安装实用工具），有关其中每项服务，并创建对象创建可执行文件。Within the constructor for `MyProjectInstaller` (which would be called by the install utility), objects are created for each of these services, and a is created for the executable. 安装实用程序，以识别`MyProjectInstaller`用作有效的安装程序，属性设置为`true`。For the install utility to recognize `MyProjectInstaller` as a valid installer, the attribute is set to `true`. 可选属性在进程安装程序和服务安装程序设置，安装程序添加到之前集合。Optional properties are set on the process installer and the service installers before the installers are added to the collection. 当安装实用工具要访问`MyProjectInstaller`，添加到的对象集合通过调用将反过来安装。When the install utility accesses `MyProjectInstaller`, the objects added to the collection through a call to will be installed in turn. 在过程中，安装程序维护状态信息，指示已安装哪些对象，因此每个可以备份反过来，如果发生安装失败。During the process, the installer maintains state information indicating which objects have been installed, so each can be backed out in turn, if an installation failure occurs. 通常情况下，您不会显式创建项目安装程序类的实例。Normally, you would not create an instance of your project installer class explicitly. 您可以创建它，并添加属性的语法，但它是由安装实用工具，它实际上调用，并因此实例化类。You would create it and add the attribute to the syntax, but it is the install utility that actually calls, and therefore instantiates, the class. [!code-cpp[Classic ServiceInstaller Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ServiceInstaller Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ServiceInstaller Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ServiceInstaller Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ServiceInstaller Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ServiceInstaller Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要安装的服务，创建的项目安装程序类继承自类，并设置到类中的属性`true`。To install a service, create a project installer class that inherits from the class, and set the attribute on the class to `true`. 您的项目内创建一个每个服务应用程序，另一个实例应用程序中每个服务实例。Within your project, create one instance per service application, and one instance for each service in the application. 在项目安装程序类构造函数，将设置为服务使用的安装属性并实例，并将实例添加到集合。Within your project installer class constructor, set the installation properties for the service using the and instances, and add the instances to the collection. 构造函数自动生成事件日志源其属性设置为计算机的应用程序日志和。The constructor automatically generates an event log source whose property is set to the computer's Application log, and an . 当您将设置的，这应该与相同的服务，事件日志的属性自动设置为相同的值。When you set the of the , which should be identical to the of the service, the property of the event log is automatically set to the same value. 在安装故障的情况下会自动删除源。The source is deleted automatically in the case of an installation failure. 构造函数设置属性设置为`ServiceStartMode.Manual`指定的用户启动该服务。The constructor sets the property to `ServiceStartMode.Manual` to specify that a user start the service. 可以为该属性重置`ServiceStartMode.Automatic`来指定该服务启动时重启计算机。You can reset the property to `ServiceStartMode.Automatic` to specify that the service start when the computer reboots.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CopyFromComponent(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub CopyFromComponent (component As IComponent)

span.span: The from which to copy.

summary.span: 将来自 的一个实例的属性复制到此安装程序。

span.span: Copies properties from an instance of to this installer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 很少会在代码中调用此方法。This method will rarely be called within your code. 通常仅由设计器调用。 is usually called only by designers. 保存的服务名称`component`参数的实例。 saves the service name of the `component` parameter to the of the instance. (因为该参数必须是派生的类的实例，`component`有属性。)(Because the parameter must be an instance of a class that derives from , `component` is guaranteed to have a property.) > [!NOTE] > 如果使用 Visual Studio 设计器，在当用户单击的设计时调用此方法`Add Installer`上指定此类为其安装程序的组件。If you are using the Visual Studio designer, this method is called at design time when the user clicks `Add Installer` on a component that specified this class as its installer. 安装程序不需要它可以从实时组件并将其存储在安装时使用的所有信息。The installer takes all information it can from the live component and stores it for use at install time.

exception.span: 正与该安装程序关联的组件并非从 继承。

span.span: The component you are associating with this installer does not inherit from .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DelayedAutoStart { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.DelayedAutoStart : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应延迟启动该服务，直到运行其他自动启动的服务。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service should be delayed from starting until other automatically started services are running.

value.span: 若要延迟该服务的自动启动，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to delay automatic start of the service; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以应用到任何服务，但它将被忽略，除非服务的启动模式是。The property can be applied to any service, but it is ignored unless the service's start mode is . 设置的下次重启系统时生效。The setting takes effect the next time the system is restarted. 服务控制管理器不保证服务特定的开始时间。The Service Control Manager does not guarantee a specific start time for the service. 延迟式自动启动服务不能是成员的加载顺序组，但它可以依赖于另一个自动启动服务。A delayed automatic start service cannot be a member of a load ordering group, but it can depend on another automatic start service. 如果应用程序调用延迟式自动启动服务，然后加载它，则调用失败。If an application calls a delayed automatic start service before it is loaded, the call fails. 在操作系统上不支持延迟式自动启动的设置此属性不起作用。On operating systems that do not support delayed automatic start, setting this property has no effect.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Description : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置服务的说明。

span.span: Gets or sets the description for the service.
The description of the service.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来描述用户已安装的服务的用途。Use the property to describe the purpose of the installed service to the user. 用户可以查看服务说明中显示已安装服务的详细信息的应用程序。The user can view the service description in applications that display details for installed services. 例如，使用 Windows XP，您可以查看与服务控制命令行实用程序 (Sc.exe) 的服务说明或可以查看中的服务说明**Services**节点的**计算机管理**控制台。For example, using Windows XP, you can view the service description with the Service Control command-line utility (Sc.exe) or you can view the service description within the **Services** node of the **Computer Management** console. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置新的 Windows 服务应用程序的安装属性。The following code example sets the installation properties for a new Windows service application. 该示例设置服务名称，以及显示名称和描述。The example sets the service name, along with the display name and description. 分配后该服务的安装属性，该示例将添加对象传递给集合。After assigning the installation properties for the service, the example adds the object to the collection. [!code-csharp[ServiceProcess_ServiceInstaller#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceProcess_serviceinstaller/CS/simpleserviceinstaller.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ServiceProcess_ServiceInstaller#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceProcess_serviceinstaller/VB/service1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DisplayName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DisplayName : string with get, set

summary.span: 指示向用户标识服务的友好名称。

span.span: Indicates the friendly name that identifies the service to the user.

value.span: 与服务关联的名称，常用于交互工具。

span.span: The name associated with the service, used frequently for interactive tools.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用时，例如，服务控制管理器中提供服务的用户可读的描述性名称。The is used, for example, in the Service Control Manager to provide a user-readable descriptive name for the service. 是注册表值，但永远不会用作注册表项。The is a registry value, but is never used as a registry key. 因此，限制不适用于属性值。Therefore, restrictions on the property value do not apply. 用作 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINES\System\CurrentControlSet\Services 注册表项，因此它是受限制。 is used as the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINES\System\CurrentControlSet\Services registry key, so it is restricted. 显示名称永远不会由安装实用工具用来标识该服务，因此有选择的名称，没有限制但有针对属性。The display name is never used by the install utility to identify the service, so there are no restrictions on the choice of name, as there is for the property.

summary.span: 通过向注册表写入服务应用程序信息来安装服务。

span.span: Installs the service by writing service application information to the registry.

summary.span: 该方法旨在由自动处理适当方法的安装工具使用。

span.span: This method is meant to be used by installation tools, which process the appropriate methods automatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，您将不会调用方法上在代码中; 它们通常称为仅由安装实用工具。Normally, you will not call the methods on within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility. 安装实用工具会自动调用在安装过程中的方法。The install utility automatically calls the method during installation. 如有必要，它退出故障，通过调用上生成了异常的对象。It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling on the object that generated the exception. 应用程序的安装例程会维护有关的组件的已安装，使用项目安装程序的自动信息。An application's install routine maintains information automatically about the components that were already installed, using the project installer's . 此状态信息传递到作为`stateSaver`参数，将持续更新作为实例和每个实用工具安装实例。This state information, passed into as the `stateSaver` parameter, is continuously updated as the instance and each instance is installed by the utility. 它是通常不需要为你的代码可以显式修改此状态信息。It is usually unnecessary for your code to modify this state information explicitly. 与项目安装类安装信息普遍适用于所有关联中项目的实例。The associated with your project installation class installs information common to all instances in the project. 如果此服务具有开来安装项目中的其他服务的任何内容，此方法被安装该服务特定的信息。If this service has anything that separates it from the other services in the installation project, that service-specific information is installed by this method. 若要安装的服务，创建的项目安装程序类继承自类，并设置到类中的属性`true`。To install a service, create a project installer class that inherits from the class, and set the attribute on the class to `true`. 您的项目内创建一个每个服务应用程序，另一个实例应用程序中每个服务实例。Within your project, create one instance per service application, and one instance for each service in the application. 在项目安装程序类构造函数，将设置为服务使用的安装属性并实例，并将实例添加到集合。Within your project installer class constructor, set the installation properties for the service using the and instances, and add the instances to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 建议用于添加安装程序实例; 使用构造函数但是，如果您需要将添加到中的集合方法，请务必执行上述相同的元素添加到集合中方法。It is recommended that you use the constructor for adding installer instances; however, if you need to add to the collection in the method, be sure to perform the same additions to the collection in the method. 所有类派生自类的状态集合必须在相同和方法。For all classes deriving from the class, the state of the collection must be the same in the and methods. 但是，您可以避免跨集合的维护并方法，如果您安装程序将实例添加到自定义安装程序类构造函数中的集合。However, you can avoid the maintenance of the collection across the and methods if you add installer instances to the collection in your custom installer class constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，您将不会调用方法上在代码中; 它们通常称为仅由安装实用工具。Normally, you will not call the methods on within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility. 安装实用工具会自动调用在安装过程中的方法。The install utility automatically calls the method during the installation process. 如有必要，它退出故障，通过调用上生成了异常的对象。It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling on the object that generated the exception. 应用程序的安装例程会维护有关已安装，使用项目安装程序的组件自动信息。An application's install routine maintains information automatically about the components already installed, using the project installer's . 此状态信息传递到作为`savedState`参数，将持续更新作为实例和每个实用工具安装实例。This state information, passed into as the `savedState` parameter, is continuously updated as the instance and each instance is installed by the utility. 它是通常不需要为你的代码可以显式修改此状态信息。It is usually unnecessary for your code to modify this state information explicitly.

summary.span: 指示系统用于标识此服务的名称。

span.span: Indicates the name used by the system to identify this service.

summary.span: 此属性必须与要安装的服务的 相同。

span.span: This property must be identical to the of the service you want to install.
The name of the service to be installed.

value.span: 该值必须在安装实用工具尝试安装服务以前进行设置。

span.span: This value must be set before the install utility attempts to install the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是至关重要的致类派生自的。It is crucial that the be identical to the of the class you derived from . 通常情况下，值服务应用程序的可执行文件的 main （） 函数中设置服务的属性。Normally, the value of the property for the service is set within the Main() function of the service application's executable. 服务控制管理器使用属性来查找此可执行文件中的服务。The Service Control Manager uses the property to locate the service within this executable. 当您将设置的服务安装程序中，相关联的事件日志的设置为相同的值。When you set the of the service installer, the of the associated event log is set to the same value. 这样，服务会自动登录到计算机上的应用程序日志的服务的命令 （例如启动和停止） 调用。This allows the service to automatically log service commands (such as Start and Stop) calls to the Application log on the computer. > [!NOTE] > 如果按相同名称的源已存在的计算机上，但日志而不是应用程序日志中，将引发异常。If a source by the same name already exists on the computer, but in a log other than the Application log, an exception will be thrown. 如果源存在且与应用程序日志相关联，该源用于报告命令调用服务，并且不会引发异常。If the source exists and is associated with the Application log, that source is used to report command calls to the service, and no exception is thrown. 不能为`null`或长度为零。The cannot be `null` or have zero length. 其最大大小为 256 个字符。Its maximum size is 256 characters. 它还不能包含正向或反斜杠 / 或\\，或使用小于 32 的十进制值字符集将 ASCII 字符。It also cannot contain forward or backward slashes, '/' or '\\', or characters from the ASCII character set with value less than decimal value 32.

span.span: The property is invalid.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ ServicesDependedOn { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ value); };
member this.ServicesDependedOn : string[] with get, set

summary.span: 指示为使该服务能够运行而必须正在运行的服务。

span.span: Indicates the services that must be running for this service to run.

value.span: 在与该安装程序关联的服务运行以前必须运行的一组服务。

span.span: An array of services that must be running before the service associated with this installer can run.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务可以要求处于运行状态，它可以启动其他服务。A service can require other services to be running before it can start. 此属性的信息写入到注册表中的键。The information from this property is written to a key in the registry. 当该用户 （或系统中，在自动启动的情况下） 尝试运行该服务时，服务控制管理器 (SCM) 验证每个数组中的服务已启动。When the user (or the system, in the case of automatic startup) tries to run the service, the Service Control Manager (SCM) verifies that each of the services in the array has already been started. 如果数组中的任何服务未运行则，则 SCM 将尝试启动它们。If any service in the array is not running then, the SCM tries to start them. 这包括服务与`Manual` 。This includes services with `Manual`. 如果此服务所依赖的任何服务无法启动，此服务将无法启动。If any service upon which this service depends fails to start, this service will not start. 如果系统未启动，因为没有在系统级别来检测到这种处理的异常，不引发异常。An exception is not thrown if the system is not started because there is no exception handling at the system level to detect this. 决定如何处理服务启动失败，并在代码中实现这一点。Decide how to handle service start failures and implement this in your code. 通常情况下，一个对话框，显示给用户在启动时，如果服务无法启动。Typically, a dialog appears to the user at startup if a service fails to start. 如果该服务未启动，应用程序事件日志中写入一个条目。If the service does not start, an entry is written to the Application event log. 此服务所依赖的服务不需要位于同一可执行文件。The services upon which this service depends do not need to be in the same executable.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceProcess::ServiceStartMode StartType { System::ServiceProcess::ServiceStartMode get(); void set(System::ServiceProcess::ServiceStartMode value); };
member this.StartType : System.ServiceProcess.ServiceStartMode with get, set

summary.span: 指示启动此服务的方式和时间。

span.span: Indicates how and when this service is started.
A that represents the way the service is started.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指定在重新启动后服务将不会自动启动。

span.span: The default is , which specifies that the service will not automatically start after reboot.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置指定，重新启动后自动启动服务或用户必须手动启动该服务。Set the to specify either that the service be started automatically after reboot or that a user must manually start the service. 服务也被禁用，指定，它之前，无法启动，手动或以编程方式启用它。A service can also be disabled, specifying that it cannot be started, either manually or programmatically, until it is enabled. 不能更改安装后的属性值。You cannot change property values after installation. 若要更改，您必须卸载并重新安装你的服务，或手动更改使用服务控制管理器的设置。To change the , you either have to uninstall and reinstall your service, or manually change the setting using the Service Control Manager.

exception.span: 启动模式不是 枚举的有效值。

span.span: The start mode is not a value of the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Uninstall(class System.Collections.IDictionary savedState) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Uninstall (savedState As IDictionary)

param.name: savedState
param.span: ，包含与安装关联的上下文信息。

span.span: An that contains the context information associated with the installation.

summary.span: 通过从注册表中移除关于服务的信息来卸载服务。

span.span: Uninstalls the service by removing information about it from the registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 卸载第一个尝试卸载之前停止服务。Uninstall first attempts to stop the service before uninstalling it. 如果不能停止该服务，不捕获到异常，和方法将继续删除服务。If the service cannot be stopped, no exception is caught, and the method continues with the removal of the service. 通常情况下，您将不会调用方法上在代码中; 它们通常称为仅由安装实用工具。Normally, you will not call the methods on within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility. InstallUtil 用于卸载服务，以及安装它们。卸载命令行调用中将一个开关。InstallUtil is used to uninstall services as well as install them; uninstalling takes a switch in the command line call. 应用程序的卸载例程维护自动有关组件的信息被卸载，使用项目安装程序的。An application's uninstall routine maintains information automatically about the components being uninstalled, using the project installer's . 此状态信息传递到作为`savedState`参数，将持续更新作为实例和每个实用工具安装实例。This state information, passed into as the `savedState` parameter, is continuously updated as the instance and each instance is installed by the utility. 它是通常不需要为你的代码可以显式修改此状态信息。It is usually unnecessary for your code to modify this state information explicitly. 所有类派生自类的状态集合必须在相同和方法。For all classes deriving from the class, the state of the collection must be the same in the and methods. 但是，您可以避免跨集合的维护并方法，如果您安装程序将实例添加到自定义安装程序类构造函数中的集合。However, you can avoid the maintenance of the collection across the and methods if you add installer instances to the collection in your custom installer class constructor. 因此如果一个服务卸载失败，这不影响其他服务 （通常在同一个安装项目中） 正在卸载，没有用于卸载，回滚机制。There is no rollback mechanism for uninstalling, so if one service fails to uninstall, this does not affect the other services (usually within the same installation project) being uninstalled.

exception.span: 未能打开服务控制管理器。

span.span: The Service Control Manager could not be opened.
-or-

exception.span: 系统未能获取服务的句柄。

span.span: The system could not get a handle to the service.
